name: Click & Click
description:
In this insanely addictive game you will climb the career ladder, from cashier to financial director! Click on monsters, collect coins, buy upgrades and go from beginning to end, becoming the most successful clicker!



Click & Click - It is an idle clicker where you can pump professions, kill various monsters, bosses and all this in engaging pixel art.



Game features:
- Time killer
- A variety of monsters and professions
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
